mapper.insert: insert into tem_course_dis( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, admission_date_time, admission_number, age, tpatno, room_no, bed_no, record_status, visit_type, department_name, inpatient_area, record_his, medical_topic, inpatient_disease_process, diagnosis_basis, order_content, record_time, doctor_sign, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{admissionDateTime}, #{admissionNumber}, #{age}, #{tpatno}, #{roomNo}, #{bedNo}, #{recordStatus}, #{visitType}, #{departmentName}, #{inpatientArea}, #{recordHis}, #{medicalTopic}, #{inpatientDiseaseProcess}, #{diagnosisBasis}, #{orderContent}, #{recordTime}, #{doctorSign}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update tem_course_dis set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv1 = #{uniqueIdLv1}, unique_id_lv2 = #{uniqueIdLv2}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, admission_date_time = #{admissionDateTime}, admission_number = #{admissionNumber}, age = #{age}, tpatno = #{tpatno}, room_no = #{roomNo}, bed_no = #{bedNo}, record_status = #{recordStatus}, visit_type = #{visitType}, department_name = #{departmentName}, inpatient_area = #{inpatientArea}, record_his = #{recordHis}, medical_topic = #{medicalTopic}, inpatient_disease_process = #{inpatientDiseaseProcess}, diagnosis_basis = #{diagnosisBasis}, order_content = #{orderContent}, record_time = #{recordTime}, doctor_sign = #{doctorSign}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
